name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Christmas Santa Claus Reindeer Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the magic of Christmas to your browser with a live wallpaper featuring Santa Claus and his reindeer!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Celebrate the magic of the season with the Christmas Santa Claus Reindeer Live Wallpaper Chrome extension. Your new tab will sparkle with the joy of Santa riding his sleigh, guided by majestic reindeer under a starry winter sky. Bring the holiday spirit to your browsing with this festive and enchanting live wallpaper.

Features:
🎅 Santa Claus and reindeer soaring across a winter wonderland.
🎄 A cozy holiday-themed new tab with beautiful animated snowfall.
🔍 Customizable search bar to suit your browsing preferences.
🕒 Built-in clock and date display to keep you on schedule.
🌐 Shortcut links to your most-used websites for quick access.
Experience the warmth and wonder of Christmas every time you open a new tab!

More extensions: https://gameograf.com/
Contact us: https://gameograf.com/contact-us/
Privacy policy: https://gameograf.com/privacy-policy/
